comment.author: 17598157@N00
comment._content:
That's a great picture! It could represent the toil of many hardworking Farmers anywhere in the World. Not knowing when and where the photo was taken I would generically tag it with:
farmer
farming
toil
planting
sand
work
food and 
crop

I think your Project is amazing. Good work.
